name: Hearts & Hexes
description:
Mages, and Faeries, and Werewolves! Oh, my!

You've never been to a Halloween party before-- in fact, you've never celebrated the holiday; but all that changes tonight!

Tonight, you've made your very own Witch costume, and you're determined to break out of your shell, make new friends, and experience all the things your family banned from you. 

It's scary, and you're terrified, but you are hell-bent on doing it anyway.

Their lies end now.

So, enjoy the party! Just be mindful, Witch, on whom you cast 'your spells and charm.'

Not all is as it appears.



You are Sabrina--an early 20-something that's never attended a Halloween party before. Honestly, you've never even been allowed to celebrate the holiday (or many others). But that changes tonight.

After years of wanting to celebrate, and overcoming the fear and weight of your family, you finally work up the courage to go.

Take a deep breath. You've got this.

Break out of your shell, make new friends, and experience the magic that is Halloween!

Your New Potential Friends: Game Features:
  • Over 40k words
  • Partial-VA, 1-Scene Fully Acted, VA'd epilogues
  • Over 8 Original Songs for Main OST
  • 9-Possible Endings
  • 5 CGs
  • Hand-Painted Backgrounds
  • Over a Dozen Sprite Expressions, Sprinkles of Magic, and References for days
  • And MORE...

Before you play the game, we want to issue a CONTENT ADVISORY courtesy.

The game's central theme is overcoming trauma, and to do so, trauma is discussed but not showcased, with exception to harassment. Player advisory.
